text: Hi friends. Let's have our stand up in the front area again. You are allowed to sit down if you wish. Ready when you are!
Is there a font decision for the demo? I'm using default fonts right now, but I can put in a custom font anytime.
All the fonts are spec'd out in the spec PDF posted above
<@U030TQFR3> / <@U0260V4K1> / <@U0265G76F> shall we push our MWC mtg to 1pm?
Layout and images are in for the splash screen and menus. Current demo is loaded up on the white gear S.
I'm heading out for today, but I'll be online!
<@U0260V1BX> <@U0260V4K1> <@U0265G76F> Let's push our meeting to tomorrow. Just shot you guys a note that there's a little MWC scope stuff changing. We should get their reqs before we keep going
no prob... my job is so easy thanks to <@U0260V1BX>'s spec doc. see you tomorrow!
